title: How to Install the Apache Web Server on a Windows PC

steps.title: If you haven't done so already, download the Apache HTTPD Web Server from the Apache web site .
steps.content: If you haven't done so already, download the Apache HTTPD Web Server from the Apache web site . Be sure to download the apache_2.2.16-win32-x86-no_ssl MSI installer here: ( http://httpd.apache.org/download.cgi )

steps.title: Save the file to your Windows Desktop
steps.content: Save the file to your Windows Desktop

steps.title: Double click the MSI file saved on your Windows Desktop.
steps.content: Double click the MSI file saved on your Windows Desktop. You will see a window that looks like this:

steps.title: Click the radio button "I accept the terms in the license agreement".
steps.content: Click the radio button "I accept the terms in the license agreement".

steps.title: On the next window, again click "Next
steps.content: On the next window, again click "Next

steps.title: Next, fill in all the text boxes with the following information:
steps.content: Next, fill in all the text boxes with the following information: "Network Domain": localhost "Server Name": localhost "Administrator's Email Address": your email address

steps.title: Make sure the radio button "for all users, on port 80, as a service - recommended" is selected.
steps.content: Make sure the radio button "for all users, on port 80, as a service - recommended" is selected.

steps.title: After you have typed in the path, click "OK" and then click "Next>".
steps.content: After you have typed in the path, click "OK" and then click "Next>". At this point, you should see a window that looks like this:

steps.title: On the next window highlight "Apache HTTP Server" and click the "change" button.
steps.content: On the next window highlight "Apache HTTP Server" and click the "change" button.

steps.title: We are going to install all the packages and scripts in the path C:
steps.content: We are going to install all the packages and scripts in the path C: \Server\Apache2\ (assuming C: is your main hard drive). So in the text box "Folder name:" type in "C:\Server\Apache2\". The ending backslash is important.

steps.title: After you have typed in the path, click "OK" and then click "Next>".
steps.content: After you have typed in the path, click "OK" and then click "Next>". At this point, you should see a window that looks like this:

steps.title: Once the Apache installation software has finished installing all the files on your computer, you will see a final window letting you know the installation was a success.
steps.content: Once the Apache installation software has finished installing all the files on your computer, you will see a final window letting you know the installation was a success. Click the "Finish" button
